title: Sweet Yams Organic Takeout
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Take-out, Soul food, Southern American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A short bus ride/walk from downtown, this little house converted to a restaurant offers soul food. The porch has been converted into a screened-in seating area. Has a vegan chili plus vegan southern greens, and vegetarian items like red beans and rice, broccoli, yams, green beans. Order at a window.
